title: Budget Types
content:
Budget types identify the different kinds of cost budgets in your projects. These budget types are codes that are defined by each business organization to describe its categories of financial activities.

When you define budget types, you group or categorize costs according to common characteristics. Grouping costs on the basis of their nature, form, source, or any other attribute, makes it easier to understand those effects, and simplifies decisions about costs and budget management.
